product_name: Marmot Jena Down Vest - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The hardwearing, versatile Marmot Jena Vest for women delivers a strong shot of warmth right to your core using 800-fill goose down, nature's finest insulator. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Ultralight polyester fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish to bead up drizzle or snow. Shell is quilted to the embossed lining to hold the down in place. Adjustable hem snugs in warmth. Marmot Jena Vest stuffs into one of the zippered hand pockets for compact carrying in your pack or luggage. Closeout.
short_description: The hardwearing, versatile Marmot Jena Vest for women delivers a strong shot of warmth right to your core using 800-fill goose down, nature's finest insulator.
